summary: Dan has a platform and he uses it to share his story in hopes of helping even one person. And he ends up helping hundreds of...
body: Dan has a platform and he uses it to share his story in hopes of helping even one person. And he ends up helping hundreds of thousands to millions of people when he speaks out on important issues. Saying I’m so proud of him is such an understatement.

summary: i think what i love most about dan is that when he makes an announcement about a big part of his life, he isn’t passive. he gets...
body: i think what i love most about dan is that when he makes an announcement about a big part of his life, he isn’t passive. he gets involved and he inserts himself in the community in such a positive way, like immediately becoming the ambassador for a mental health organization after opening up about his depression and now that he’s officially come out he’s helping to promote lgbt+ rights and just using his platform and his influence to make a positive impact on the world and i really really love and appreciate him for that

reblog.comment: i think what i love most about dan is that when he makes an announcement about a big part of his life, he isn’t passive. he gets involved and he inserts himself in the community in such a positive way, like immediately becoming the ambassador for a mental health organization after opening up about his depression and now that he’s officially come out he’s helping to promote lgbt+ rights and just using his platform and his influence to make a positive impact on the world and i really really love and appreciate him for that

trail.content: i think what i love most about dan is that when he makes an announcement about a big part of his life, he isn’t passive. he gets involved and he inserts himself in the community in such a positive way, like immediately becoming the ambassador for a mental health organization after opening up about his depression and now that he’s officially come out he’s helping to promote lgbt+ rights and just using his platform and his influence to make a positive impact on the world and i really really love and appreciate him for that

tags: please stop hating on the phan shippers
summary: Look, I'm assuming from your blog that you're a kid, but you have to hear: as a person who has been shipped, had fanfic written...
question: Look, I'm assuming from your blog that you're a kid, but you have to hear: as a person who has been shipped, had fanfic written about them, by people I knew in real life, while I was already out, made me incredibly uncomfortable. I cannot tell you how angry and upset your post about shipping Phan possibly gave Dan the courage to come out, especially since it comes off as very entitled. I'm not trying to start anything, but you should really take a step back and think about the implications of it
answer:
1. I’m 16 years old. I’ll be an adult in less than two years.

2. I said “maybe” it gave him some courage, not “definitely”.

3. I act like a kid because I want my blog to be wholesome and happy, and I have a very childish personality.

4. If the Phandom was constantly saying how gross it was to see how close Dan and Phil were, and how them acting so affectionate is weird and they shouldn’t be doing that, I really don’t think that’d help any more. Maybe go find some antis to anon. Especially if him and Phil were/are together, and wanted to be able to express some affection on camera.

5. I’ve been shipped and had rumours made about me and the dude I was in love with the whole time we went to school together. He ended up having to homeschool, and soon I did too. But it wasn’t because people thought we’d be a cute couple and talked amongst themselves respectfully. I was okay with jokes. It was when people isnsited we were together and pressured us to kiss and crap. I actually appreciated and felt honoured by those who thought we were cute together, as long as they kept it to themselves. I’m still in love with him. Have known him for 13 and a half years.

6. My way of “shipping Phan” is appreciating their relationship, whatever it is. Romantic or platonic, it’s beautiful. I treasure precious moments between them, because a relationship like there’s is so so so rare and beautiful. They love eachother, in whatever way it is. If the shipping, or appreciation of what him and Phil have didn’t help him come out, or feel more confident in his sexuality, then he wouldn’t have mentioned those interested in what they have being taken as a compliment in his eyes.

7. I made the post to maybe try and bounce back at those who were accusing all Phan shippers of fetishising and invading privacy. If their idea that thinking two people could have a beautiful future together is “fetishising”, then maybe my far fetched idea should’ve been accepted in the same way. It was a post to prove that people will always believe the negative more easily. Negative allegations are always accepted more, without even the slightest bit of reason or evidence because people love the “tea” and drama. When someone tries to make a positive point, they’re seen as trying to “get attention”. When someone even barely mentions that what they themselves, and others in their community are doing is “good”, they’re seen as boastful or entitled. Being proud of ourselves isn’t selfish. Being happy that there could’ve been a possibility that we helped Dan out is anything but selfish. The only reason we’d be proud of doing so is because we care about Dan, and knowing we may have helped him out is one of the most comforting things we could hear. Encouraging your community, and congratulating them for being supportive isn’t being “entitled”, it’s being uplifting.

I know this anon may not have meant to be an attack, but if I see one more person talking crap about Phan shippers who respect Dan and Phil and just want them to be happy, I will explode. I love my fellow Phan shippers, and we just want Dan and Phil to be happy. Maybe you should take a step back and think about the implications of your anon.
